section1.title: 1. Use of Service
section1.text: By using this application (the "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service (the "Terms").

section2.title: 2. Privacy Protection
section2.text: The Service automatically detects faces in user photos and applies blur effects. Processed image data is stored only on the user's device and is never transmitted to external servers.

section3.title: 3. Prohibited Uses
section3.text: You are prohibited from using the Service for illegal purposes or to infringe upon the rights of others.

section4.title: 4. Disclaimer
section4.text: We assume no responsibility for any damages arising from the use of this Service.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.text: This app only processes image data from photos selected by users. We do not collect any personally identifiable information.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Information Use
section2.text: Collected image data is used solely for face recognition and blur processing purposes.

section3.title: 3. Information Storage
section3.text: Processed image data is stored only on the user's device. Image data is never transmitted to our servers.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Disclosure
section4.text: We do not provide user image data to third parties.
